_header: Blessed must Thou be Thou bird so bright
_description: John Audelay, hymn ‘De sancta maria’ — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Heyle of wymmen flour of all / Thou herst vs when we to the call’

BodDou302.First Lines:
Blessid mot þou be þou berd so bryȝtModer &
                    maidon most of myȝt…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…We prayn þe dame & dameselþat þou bryng vs
                    in to þi bal
